definition: (logic) a proposition that is accepted as true in order to provide a basis for logical reasoning, take as a given
details:
noun
- (logic) a proposition that is accepted as true in order to provide a basis for logical reasoning
= synonyms: postulate
verb
- take as a given
= synonyms: postulate
- put before
= synonyms: state
- to put something somewhere firmly
= example: to put something somewhere firmly
= synonyms: fix
